title: Dual Wifi and LTE connectivity does not work
content:
I am working on a technology that uses WiFi and LTE connectivity simultaneously. While testing on my Pixel 3a, I am seeing that LTE is put to sleep when there is a wifi network available. 

LTE being on sleep stops our technology to perform on pixel devices the same as other Android phones.

Is there a work around to this where I can keep both connections active?
